title: Justin Bieber's wife Hailey Baldwin makes cryptic post after Selena Gomez throws shade
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Hailey Bieber has broken her silence after Selena Gomez seemingly criticised her ex Justin Bieber for settling down with Hailey in a new song.

The model posted a screenshot of a song called I'll Kill You on her Instagram story, with no caption included.

It suggests it's her way of silencing things between the two after former Disney Channel star Selena made a dig at the loved-up couple.

Just a few weeks after high-school sweethearts Hailey and Justin tied the knot, Selena sang about the pain of heartbreak in her new track Lose You To Love Me.

Her scathing lyrics were convincingly aimed at her ex boyfriend Justin as he got engaged to Vogue model Hailey just two months after they split.

(Image: Instagram)

Selena and Justin were together from 2009 to 2017, and shortly after Selena dated The Weeknd for a brief time.

However, the long-time lovers called it quits in March and by July Justin was engaged to his other ex Hailey.

Justin and Hailey were married in the September of that year and they got married for a second time in recent months.

(Image: Instagram)

The lyrics read: "I gave my all and they all know it / You turned me down, and now it’s showing / In two months you replaced us / Like it was easy / Made me think I deserved it."

Another chorus added: "Cause it wasn’t yours / You promised the world / Made her more of a woman / I needed to lose you to find me."

(Image: Getty Images for WE)

Fans put the feelers out on social media as they claimed Selena was responding to her ex's marriage to Hailey.

"Justin hiding from Hailey to listen to Selena’s new song #LoseYouToLoveMe."

"If Selena wants to write about Justin Bieber, LET HER. She can heal however she needs to and wants to. Everyone deals with their own pain in different ways. Goodbye. #LoseYouToLoveMe."
description: Hailey shared a shady post after Selena's dig at herself and new hubby Justin
